title: 93/83/EEC: Commission Decision of 22 December 1992 amending Commission Decisions 92/430/EEC and 92/431/EEC drawing up lists of border inspection posts preselected for veterinary checks on products and animals from third countries
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 22 December 1992  amending Commission Decisions 92/430/EEC and 92/431/EEC drawing up lists of border inspection posts  preselected for veterinary checks on products and animals from third countries
(93/83/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The sections for Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy,  Portugal and Spain of the Annex to Decision 92/430/EEC are replaced by the sections appearing in  Annex I to this Decision.
The sections for Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Portugal, Spain and  the United Kingdom are replaced by the sections appearing in Annex II to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 December 1992.
For the Commission Ray MAC SHARRY Member of the Commission
